narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Developmental Disabilities Center is a Day Training  Developmentally Disabled Services provider based in Lafayette, CO. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $114.2M in Medicaid payments across 178K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $114.2M in taxpayer-funded Medicaid payments — enough to fund healthcare for approximately 14,275 Medicaid beneficiaries for a full year at average per-enrollee costs.
